attributes.action: not allow Sharia Law into this country and our courts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As of today the Lord Chief Justice, Lord Phillips of Worth Matravers said there was no reason why sharia principles could not be used in "mediation or other forms of alternative dispute resolution". Actually the British people are a very good reason not to allow this to happen. It is unacceptable to have even suggested it. This is Britain with British laws and British courts, I request we keep it this way unless we want to lose everything this country has worked and fought for. Do not allow 'Judges' to make decisions like this. We are a democratic country, the people will decide whatever the Government enforce.
